body.p: You commissionsed Tho Mitchell Justice of the peace in the 2nd District, Louisville, in place of George Morris resigned, which commission by Rev. statutes, expired on the day of the May election. On that day Mr Bradley ran without opposition.
The fact of the vacancy was not brought to my attention in time for me to issue a writ of election.
Under the circumstances, I think Mr Bradley ought to have the commission,
